name: Empty Nest (Jess Molloy, Mako Ikeno, musicworm, JasdUp, Charllay, Giulia_Na)
name_original: Empty Nest (Jess Molloy, Mako Ikeno, musicworm, JasdUp, Charllay, Giulia_Na)
description:
Developed over 6 days as part of the Side Quest with Women in Games, with the theme "Mother."
Inspired by "Are You My Mother" by P. D. Eastman.

Volume and Background Transparency adjustable in Pause Menu (Top Left).

Controls

'A' and 'D' to move / 'Space' and 'W' to Jump
'Left' and 'Right' Arrow Keys to move / 'Up' to Jump

Team

Brittney Anthony (Background Art)
Charlotte Laycock (3D Art)
Giulia Ferraioli (Programming)
Jasmine Tania Gutierrez (UI/UX)
Jess Molloy (Game Design, Level Design, 2D Art)
Mako Ikeno (Audio, Music)
Mercedes Hesselroth (Narrative)

Updates to come:

  • Voice Over
  • Fixes

    • Credits 'Desing' to 'Design'
